bibl.title: Corinna and Pindar.
Nomodeiktes. Greek Studies in Honor of Martin Ostwald
bibl.author: CLAYMAN, Dee L.

bibl.note: If we see Corinna's work in the Alexandrian tradition, it is possible to account for all of the testimony that seems to make her a contemporary of Pindar.
CLAYMAN Dee L., Corinna and Pindar.
Ralph M. ROSEN and Joseph FARRELL (Edd.), Nomodeiktes. Greek Studies in Honor of Martin Ostwald (Ann Arbor, 1993) pp. 633-642.
